org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.jpa.converter
Class ContextStackAttributeConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.jpa.converter.ContextStackAttributeConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
AttributeConverter<org.apache.logging.log4j.ThreadContext.ContextStack,String>
public class ContextStackAttributeConverter
extends Object
implements AttributeConverter<org.apache.logging.log4j.ThreadContext.ContextStack,String>

A JPA 2.1 attribute converter for ThreadContext.ContextStacks in LogEvents. This converter is only capable of converting to Strings. The convertToEntityAttribute(String) method throws an UnsupportedOperationException. If you need to support converting to an entity attribute, you should use the ContextStackJsonAttributeConverter for conversion both ways.
